posts.post_title: FS: Old Judge PSA 6 & 7 - Patton & Pinkney
posts.post_content:
I have the following two high grade 1887 Old Judges available...

PSA 7 MK - George Pinkney - Brooklyn - $500
PSA 6 - Owen Patton - Des Moines - $950
